Body:
ens = Ensemble.read(os.path.join(dataExtern(), 'all',
    'Om0.295_Ol0.705_w-1.878_ns0.960_si0.100', 'subfield1', 'sigma05',
    'power_spectrum.npy'))
chi2 = ens.selfChi2()
assert chi2.shape[0] == ens.shape[0]
fig, ax = plt.subplots()
n, bins, patch = ax.hist(chi2.values, bins=50, normed=True, histtype=
    'stepfilled', alpha=0.5)
ax.plot(stats.chi2.pdf(bins, ens.shape[1]))
ax.set_xlabel('$\\chi^2$')
ax.set_ylabel('$P(\\chi^2)$')
fig.savefig('self_chi2.png')
